title: Lexy
text: A virtual assistant/chatbot to streamline HR and LMS processes by integrating multiple platforms in one place.

title: Chasma Editor ™
text: A template editor where you can drag 'n' drop and customize widgets to create dashboards for your SumTotal LMS ®

title: Quoting Tool
text: An enterprise app that manages the life-cycle of quotations of Curvature ™

title: Togetherly
text: A hybrid mobile app that helps couples to have a strong relationship with each other.

title: Rebinner
text: A tool used to change the locator of a device.

title: TalentX
text: A HR solution designed to overcome the day to day challenges through SASS model.

title: ICampuslite
text: A social collaboration platform for campuses with a complete suite of collection.

title: SharePoint Portal Customization
text: Customizing and creating new WebParts for the intranet portal of Curvature ™

title: TWS2 Port Tester
text: A desktop app which is used to test parallely the ports of an electronic device.

title: TWS2 General Application
text: An enterprise app which is used to test the hardware components in order to generate quotation for reselling them.

title: TWS2 Script Editor
text: A Python script editor application which is used to test hardware devices.

title: Data Feed for Yamaha ®
text: A data feed app that processes input files and generates the required output to be processed by SumTotal ® DSU.

title: Pixentia ™ website
text: The company website which present information about its services, blogs, etc.

title: Yamaha ® Web Services Upgrade
text: The upgrade of Yamaha's ® training portal based on SumTotal LMS ®.

title: ASI ® Job Feed
text: A job feed to update employee's training data in Yamaha ® LMS portal.

title: CUNA ® Data Feed
text: A job feed to update employee's training data in CUNA ® LMS portal.
